origin.spilaioorigins.nesji.name: Nesji
origin.spilaioorigins.nesji.description: The result of a rojian losing the last of their humanity. They require power from redstone.
origin.spilaioorigins.rojian.name: Rojian
origin.spilaioorigins.rojian.description: The rojian are a subspecies of humans. They are enhanced by redstone at the cost of their humanity over time.
origin.spilaioorigins.shroomatid.name: Shroomatid
origin.spilaioorigins.shroomatid.descrip: An invasive mushroom species. Shroomatai are hard to kill and are at home in the dark, making them perfect for stealth attacks.
power.spilaioorigins.spores.name: Spores
power.spilaioorigins.spores.description: Your spores are poisonous, giving you a chance to critically wound something when you hit it.
power.spilaioorigins.lightweight.name: Lightweight
power.spilaioorigins.lightweight.descrip: Because you are a mushroom, you're lighter. Because you're lighter, you take no fall damage.
power.spilaioorigins.shroom_limbs.name: Shroom Limbs
power.spilaioorigins.shroom_limbs.descri: Because you are a mushroom, your arms cannot wield a shield.
power.spilaioorigins.mushroom_vision.des: Due to your ancestors not having eyes, you can use other senses to locate your surroundings.
power.spilaioorigins.drowning.name: Plant-like Biology
power.spilaioorigins.drowning.descriptio: Your plant-like construct causes you to die after absorbing too much water.
power.spilaioorigins.invasive_species.de: As you are an invasive species, you are naturally hard to kill.
power.spilaioorigins.half_organic.name: Half Organic
power.spilaioorigins.half_organic.descri: You are half organic, making fire more dangerous, but you run more efficiently.
power.spilaioorigins.robotic_eye.name: Robotic Eye
power.spilaioorigins.robotic_eye.descrip: Your robotic implants allow you to see in the dark
power.spilaioorigins.robotic_eyes.name: Robotic Eyes
power.spilaioorigins.robotic_eyes.descri: Both of your eyes have robotic implants, giving your vision a green tint, and giving you stronger night vision.
power.spilaioorigins.sinking.name: Weighted Frame
power.spilaioorigins.sinking.description: Your weighted body makes it impossible to swim or use an elytra.
power.spilaioorigins.tank.name: Tanky
power.spilaioorigins.tank.description: As you are enhanced by redstone, your defense is also enhanced.
power.spilaioorigins.metal_plating.name: Metal Plating
power.spilaioorigins.metal_plating.descr: Due to metal plating on your body, you are much more defended than you used to be.
power.spilaioorigins.human_corrosion.des: You gradually lose your humanity, until you become a nesiji.
power.spilaioorigins.redstone_enhanced.d: Your body and mind are enhanced by redstone, making you faster and stronger.
power.spilaioorigins.redstone_body.name: Redstone Body
power.spilaioorigins.redstone_body.descr: Your body is primary made out of redstone instead of water, causing interesting abilities to develop.
death.attack.waterAbsorption.player: %1$s drank too much water while being chased by %2$s
